mapper.select: SELECT pan_id AS panId, comment_id AS commentId, content, user_id AS userId, nickname, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM comments WHERE pan_id = #{panId} AND is_deleted = false ORDER BY comment_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (comment_id, pan_id, content, user_id, nickname, is_deleted) VALUES (#{commentId}, #{panId}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{nickname}, false)
